description: This is a shell script (.sh) designed for telemetry data upload, with mechanisms for handling retries, indicating it's part of a telemetry or data collection system. It manages connections over HTTP, TFTP, and Codebig, performs endpoint determination, and queues failed upload attempts for retransmission.

methods.name: getTelemetryEndpoint
methods.description: Determines the telemetry upload URL based on RFC settings or response files.

methods.name: pidCleanup
methods.description: Removes the process ID temporary file.

methods.name: IsDirectBlocked
methods.description: Checks if direct connection is temporarily blocked.

methods.name: get_Codebigconfig
methods.description: Configures Codebig connection settings based on device configuration.

methods.name: useDirectRequest
methods.description: Handles telemetry data upload over direct HTTP or TFTP.

methods.name: useCodebigRequest
methods.description: Handles telemetry data upload over Codebig connection.

methods.name: getErouterIpv4
methods.description: Retrieves the IPv4 address of the erouter interface.

methods.name: getErouterIpv6
methods.description: Retrieves the IPv6 address of the erouter interface.
